name: Final Cut: Encore Collector's Edition
description: Your murderous half-sister has escaped, and you've got the last piece of your father's treacherous film projector...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1257 MB available space
